Class: Stats

util/stats. Stats

new Stats()

Construct a stats recorder.

Members

averages :Object

A named map of stats and their averages over the last 10 samples. E.g. stats.averages['fps'];

Methods

count(name, val)

Count a named stat. The last 10 recorded stats for each name will be stored and accessible as averages.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name String The stat to count
val Number The new value for the stat
